articles.author: Celia Fernandez
articles.title: 36-year-old lives and travels in her truck full-time, spends $1,305/month: 'I'm comfortable in very small spaces' - CNBC
articles.description: Ashley Kay bought a Toyota Tacoma and started to journey the Pan-American Highway.
articles.content:
In 2019, Ashley Kaye took a scuba diving trip to Honduras that changed the course of her life.
On that trip, Kaye met someone who travels full-time, and the conversation they had helped her realize … [+6260 chars]
